web_snippets: Dr Himali McInnes is the author of The Unexpected Patient, a collection of medical essays published by HarperCollins in 2021. She is a Sri Lankan-born, ...
Himali McInnes is a doctor. She writes fiction, poetry and essays and has been published in various literary journals and anthologies.
